page.title: 05THE NEW ROAD
page.content: A NEW ROAD HAS BEEN BUILT TO RELIEVE THE HEAVY TRAFFIC ON THE SMALLER ROADS IN THIS AREA.THE ROAD IS THE A120.IT CUTS THROUGH THE NORTHERN PART OF THE AREA,CROSSES OVER THE OLD A604 (HARWICH ROAD) AND JOINS THE A133 AT A LARGE ROUNDABOUT (GR 103235). THE ROAD IS USED BY A LOT OF {HOLIDAY TRAFFIC,}GOING TO CLACTON, WALTON AND FRINTON.THE NEW ROAD HAS HAD A SERIOUS EFFECT ON PUBLIC HOUSES AND GARAGES THAT GREW UP ALONG THE SMALLER ROADS,RELYING ON THE TRAFFIC FOR THEIR INCOME.UNFORTUNATELY,TO MAKE THE ROAD POSSIBLE SOME OF THE RICH FARMLAND HAD TO BE DESTROYED. MORF06200135
